name: Birdie Fall
description:
• Birdie Fall •

Birdie Fall will test your reflex skills and ability to problem solve, despite its simple design. Your ultimate impossible goal is to continually guide your basket while catching little birds in order to score as many points as you can. Sounds simple? It's not!

• FEATURES •

- One touch controls, touch to drag the basket
- You can drag either left or right to catch little birds
- Easy and fun to play, but a challenge to fully master
- Stunning graphics, beautifully detailed world comes to life

Catch all the little birds with your basket !

- Lots of fun
- Nice graphics
- Challenging game physics
- Addicting gameplay
- Clear and simple UI
- Leaderboard
What are you waiting for? GET IT NOW!
